208 
209  def select(self, username=None, database=None):
210  if not username: return False
211  if not database: return False
212 
213  upass = None
214  ulang = None
215 
216  if database.__name__ == "God":
217  try:
218  usr = database.objects.get()
219  except database.DoesNotExist:
220  return False
221  except database.MultipleObjectsReturned:
222  return False
223 
224  username = usr.username
225  upass = usr.password
226  else:
227 
228  try:
229  uid = database.objects.get(value=username, field='NAME')
230  uid = uid.identity
231  upass = database.objects.get(identity=uid, field='PASSWORD')
232  upass = upass.value
233  except database.DoesNotExist:
234  return False
235 
236  if(database.__name__ == "Student" or
237  database.__name__ == "Professor"):
238  try:
239  ulang= database.objects.get(identity=uid, field='LANGUAGE')
240  ulang= ulang.value
241  except database.DoesNotExist:
242  return False
243  else:
244  ulang = settings.LANGUAGE_CODE
245 
246  return { 'name': username, 'password': upass, 'language': ulang }
